tasks.task: Install irrigation system in a high tunnel
subtasks: Connect water tower via gravity feed
Install 90-degree bend for pipe direction change
Attach three-quarter inch hose to end of pipe
Connect garden hose adapter for initial testing
Set up medium-sized irrigation system for high tunnel
Install filter, pressure regulators, and drip tape termination components
Terminate drip tape ends using foldback method and Gorilla tape
Connect Bluetooth irrigation controller for scheduling
